arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدْ وَصَّلْنَا لَهُمُ الْقَوْلَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
english: And indeed now We have conveyed the Word (this Quran in which is the news of everything to them), in order that they may remember (or receive admonition).
bengali: আমি তাদের কাছে উপর্যুপরি বাণী পৌছিয়েছি। যাতে তারা অনুধাবন করে।
